content: **size** only size **final measurement** circumference 47 25 /120 cm height 12 25 /31 cm **yarn amount** 2 skeins of malabrigo arroyo 100% merino wool 335 yds / 305 m per 100g colourway 036 pearl or 610 yds / 610 m of double knitting yarn **needles** us #6 4 mm circular needle 40 / 100 cm long **notions** tapestry needle 1 stitch marker **gauge** stockinette stitch 22 sts and 28 rnds = 4 / 10 cm rib pattern 1 pattern repeat of 20 sts and 40 rnds is 3 / 7 5 cm wide and 5 / 12 5 cm high
